name: The Last Stand (itch) (Mr. HBX)
description:
Last Stand is about a soldier returning home to find his town overrun by zombies and must gather all the gold he can find/carry and escape before being eaten by the zombies.  Thanks for your time. The game currently contains 3 levels and coins reset if you die.

Source code can also be found at the Link below:

https://www.dropbox.com/s/2jlqvg1f17enjt3/LastStand%20Source%20Code.zip?dl=0
